Introduction

Lee Hong Gi is a South Korean singer-songwriter and actor under FNC Entertainment. He is a member and lead vocalist of the boy band FTISLAND. He was also a member of the project band A.N.JELL under the name Jermy.

He made his solo debut on November 18, 2015 with his first mini album FM302.
